description: Sets up local git to sign & verify commits
name: git-commit-signing

allowed_signers_file.description: Path to file containing list of allowed signers. Leave blank if you don't have one. Will be put as-is to git configuration. Learn how to create one: https://docs.gitlab.com/user/project/repository/signed_commits/ssh/#verify-commits-locally

force_verification_on_merge.description: Forces signature verification when merging changes. Requires 'allowed_signers_file' to be set.

signing_key.description: Path to signing key (SSH, GPG) or ID of the x509 key kept in smimesign. Will be put as-is to git configuration. See: https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/managing-commit-signature-verification/telling-git-about-your-signing-key#telling-git-about-your-x509-key-1
